nodes.text: A toad was a creature whose body was similar to that of a Thunian wart-hornet minus the wings. Luke Skywalker used the terms "toad" and "frog" interchangeably. Leia Organa once compared Emperor Palpatine to an "evil old toad." On Jelucan, youth played Lizard-toad-snake, a zero-sum hand game in which "toad" would trump "lizard."
